meanings.sent1: The ancient city was protected by strong vallums.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers stood guard along the vallums of the castle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children pretended the vallums were a giant maze.
meanings.sent4: The vallums of the fortress stood tall like a shield against invaders.
meanings.sent5: The vallums loomed imposingly, a symbol of safety and strength.

meanings.definition: A fortification consisting of a rampart and a ditch.
meanings.sent1: The vallums surrounding the fort were deep and wide.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists discovered the remains of ancient vallums in the valley.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy dug a small ditch next to the vallums.
meanings.sent4: The vallums were like a protective embrace around the stronghold.
meanings.sent5: The vallums encircled the fortress, a formidable barrier to any intruders.
